named-query.name: Station.findByStationNumbers
named-query.query: select s from Station s where s.number in (:stationNumbers)

named-query.name: Measurement.findByStationAndUnitAndMeasureTime
named-query.query: select m from Measurement m where m.station.id = :stationId and m.unit.id = :unitId and m.measureTime = :measureTime
